      Methods in chess that return Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece Board.getPiece(java.lang.String filerank)
      This method will take in a String filerank and return the Piece that is located at that filerank, if piece is empty, return null
      Methods in chess with parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Pawn.canEnpassantLeft(Piece p)
      method that tells if a piece can enpassant diagonally left
      boolean Pawn.canEnpassantRight(Piece p) 
      boolean Board.setPiece(java.lang.String filerank, Piece piece)

      Method parameters in chess with type arguments of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.initializePieces(java.util.ArrayList<Piece> pieces, Board board, char color)
      Will Create and initialize all of the Player's pieces at the beginning of the game and add them to the chess board and each player's ArrayList.
